name: False Awakening - Ghost Stories
description:
False Awakening - Ghost Stories

False Awakening is a horror game inspired by urban legends and superstitious beliefs in my country. A single game yet consists of episodes which tell different stories of 'Life beyond Death' and every episode has different gameplay and game mechanics to enjoy.

EPISODES:

Episode 1: Lost Soul - First-person psychological adventure. A short game about the story of mother and daughter.

Episode 2: Unforgotten Memories (In development) - First-person survival. Parallel universe is real where you need to travel and embark to the 'Dark World'. The world of memories, where you should find your memory. You need to remember everything. But beware, your other self will hunt you down. 

Note: 

The game is currently on its early access, you may experience bugs and errors. I would like to know your feedback to make this game better.  This game doesn't support full screen at the moment. Please wait for the further updates.

Donations:

This game is 100% free. But you can support me by donating to my Paypal and Gcash account. Please, help me to make better games. I made this game only using my potato laptop. I hope you guys enjoy.!

GCASH: 09203191437  |  PAYPAL: www.paypal.me/JanuaryCen
